org.jasig.cas.integration.pac4j.authentication.handler.support

Class UsernamePasswordWrapperAuthenticationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.authentication.AbstractAuthenticationHandler
      • org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support.AbstractPreAndPostProcessingAuthenticationHandler
        • org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support.AbstractPac4jAuthenticationHandler
          • org.jasig.cas.integration.pac4j.authentication.handler.support.AbstractWrapperAuthenticationHandler<UsernamePasswordCredential,org.pac4j.http.credentials.UsernamePasswordCredentials>
            • org.jasig.cas.integration.pac4j.authentication.handler.support.UsernamePasswordWrapperAuthenticationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MongoAuthenticationHandler, StormpathAuthenticationHandler

    public class UsernamePasswordWrapperAuthenticationHandler
extends AbstractWrapperAuthenticationHandler<UsernamePasswordCredential,org.pac4j.http.credentials.UsernamePasswordCredentials>
    Pac4j authentication handler which works on a CAS username / password credential and uses a pac4j authenticator and profile creator to play authentication.
    Since:
    4.2.0

        Description copied from class: AbstractWrapperAuthenticationHandler
        Convert a CAS credential into a pac4j credentials to play the authentication.
        Specified by:
        convertToPac4jCredentials in class AbstractWrapperAuthenticationHandler<UsernamePasswordCredential,org.pac4j.http.credentials.UsernamePasswordCredentials>
        Parameters:
        casCredential - the CAS credential
        Returns:
        the pac4j credentials
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - On authentication failure.
        PreventedException - On the indeterminate case when authentication is prevented.
